sentence.Network_en: She wore her hat rakishly at an angle.

entry.tran: 不拘俗套的；潇洒得意的
entry.def: A rakish person or appearance is stylish in a confident, bold way.

example.ex: ...a soft-brimmed hat which he wore at a rakish angle.
example.tran: 他潇洒地歪戴着的一顶软边帽

sentences.sentence: "she wore her hat rakishly at an angle"

auth_sentence.content: Benjamin as a rakishly-dressed, latter-day Prince figure for the hip hop generation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Benjamin as a rakishly-dressed, latter-day Prince figure for the hip hop generation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Benjamin as a rakishly-dressed, latter-day Prince figure for the hip hop generation.

auth_sentence.content: Pocket squares aren't folded but stuffed in and left to spill out, rakishly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pocket squares aren't folded but stuffed in and left to spill out, rakishly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pocket squares aren't folded but stuffed in and left to spill out, rakishly.
